                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void cancelTask(@RequestParam(value="task")

        Handler method for task cancellation.

      • finishTask

        @RequestMapping(value="/Task/Save",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String finishTask(@RequestParam(value="task")
                                            Long id)
        Handler method for task output saving.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the task to be finished.
        Returns:
        The name of the output file. Error if saving of the task output fails. Limit reached message if the output file exceeds the allowed storage space.
